page.title: 16Biggin Hall Farm.
page.content:
This is a grade 2 * listed building. The original part of the house,now the {kitchen and dining room, was built {about 1472.}The later part was added in{1672.
The Hall is now a{Guest House.}It has been modernized inside with central heating and modern bathrooms. It can accommodate approximately 27 people and it is also open non residents for meals. Two full time and one part time workers are employed.
The Hall stands in its own grounds of about{9 acres. }Most of this is used for silage,though 500 trees were planted this year.
The present owners have been in the Hall for 11 years.
